### Exterior Drop Boxes for Mail Tender Notice

**Title**: Exterior Drop Boxes for Mail
**English**: The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) requires the supply and delivery of exterior drop boxes for taxpayers to deposit mail.

**French**: L'Agence du Revenu du Canada exige la fourniture et la livraison de boîtes de dépôt extérieure pour les contribuables pour déposer le courrier.

**Reference Information**:

* Reference Number: cb-4140-35858814
* Solicitation Number: 1000440277
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2023-03-08
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-22T14:00:00
* Amended Date: 2023-03-22

**Tender Description**:

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking bids for the supply and delivery of seventeen (17) new exterior drop boxes. The drop boxes will be installed at designated CRA locations across Canada to securely collect taxpayer mail. The drop boxes will be used for a one-year period, with options to purchase additional units during that timeframe.

**Key Details**:

* Request Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Tenders Accepted Until: 2023-03-22T14:00:00
* Award Method: Lowest Price

**Contracting Entity**:

* Entity Name: Canada Revenue Agency
* Entity Address: 250 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0L5

**Contact Information**:

* Name: Katherine Hutton
* Title: Senior Supply/Business Analyst
* Email: [Katherine.hutton@cra-arc.gc.ca](mailto:Katherine.hutton@cra-arc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 286-5340
